summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $250.00 from the general fund of the City of Seattle, in settlement of the claim of Christina Buchanan for personal injuries received by her on the 24th day of November, 1915, at about the hour of 3:30 P.M., while walking on the wooden sidewalk on the north side of Pine Street, between 7th Avenue and the alley between 7th and 8th Avenues, in said city, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
